SEARCH
Package cz.masterart.glada.planner

Class ConditionLine

java.lang.Object
cz.masterart.glada.planner.ConditionLine
public class ConditionLine extends Object
The planner selects the action ID from the first condition line found in which the entered data matches the conditions.
The condition line sets the next conditions:
  • - start (from) and stop (to) hours
  • - work days only (days without sunday, saturday and legal holidays)
  • - days os week (set of 1..7)
  • - days of month (set of 1..31)
  • - months (set of 1..12)
